name: Klean Kanteen Classic Stainless Steel Bottle 1.18L
description: Need to take the whole pot of coffee to go? This big bottle carries 1.18L of your favourite beverage.Made of food-grade, unlined stainless steel that doesn't impart flavours.Klean Coat™ finish is resistant to chips and daily wear.Rounded corners are easy to clean.Polypropylene loop-top cap with stainless steel threads clips to a pack or bag.Dishwasher-safe.
